videos.description: Julius Randle has the hot hand in the first quarter, scoring 20 points and leading the Knicks to a 26-point lead.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NBA Highlight (Randle outscores the Pistons by himself in the first quarter) 2021/4/3 ESHEET SOTFULL
